author: chfast
content: I started writing short EVM performance report touching some random aspect (there is no plan, no big picture) depending what I'm currently working on.

author: pcaversaccio
content: Hi guys, sorry for asking maybe a noobs question, but until now nobody was able to answer it. As far as I know, the EVM does not support garbage collection. Therefore, memory usage can only increase (and not decrease) during a single EVM execution. Can someone explain to me why this design was chosen? PS: If I should post this question in another channel just let me know. Thx for any help.
